categories: Category:Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords voice actors

nodes.text: David Weatherley is a well-known performer who has played many roles in film, television and the theater. He is best remembered as Barliman Butterbur in The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring. He is credited with voicing additional characters in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords.
